title: Warrior Voice Pack Of 118 Efforts and Phrases
description: 118 Efforts and Phrases For Any Game, HQ Mono .wav files in 44.1khz Studio Quality, unique phrases and efforts of a deep voice viking or warrior for FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games, Mobile Games!
longDescription:
LISTEN TO PACK HERE | LIST OF PHRASES


This pack includes 118 High Quality Deep Low Warrior Voice Hero voice pack, recorded on Studio Equipment by a professional voice actor and covers everything you need for your next project.


The voice suites any deep voice character you might need such as:

  • Viking Character
  • Warrior Character
  • Brute Character
  • Barbarian Character
  • Any Deep Voice NPC character.


This pack is great for genres such as:

  • FPS
  • MOBA
  • RPG
  • Action Adventure
  • Survival
  • Horror
  • Shooter
  • RTS
  • Sandbox games
  • Side Scrollers
  • Retro Games
  • Animation
  • Videos
  • And the list goes on!


All efforts and phrases included in this pack are unique and completely royalty-free that have been mixed and mastered to studio level quality.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 118 HQ Mono .wav files of good selection of common efforts and phrases for any game
  • Professional Male Voice Actor
  • This pack is divided into the effort/phrases type to locate the files easily
  • Top of the line studio quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality .WAV (24 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.



TECHNICAL DETAILS:

  • Number of Audio tracks: 118
  • Number of Audio Cues: 118
  • Sample rate: 44.1knz 24bit 1058 kbps MONO
  • Does audio loop: YES
  • Minutes of audio provided: 3:08 min
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Supported Target Build Platforms: All


Music in preview is NOT included in this pack. It’s used for watermark purposes only.


Keywords: character, character voices, voice pack, vocals, voices, male, male voice, hero, npc, warrior, deep voice, barbarian, viking, authentic, real, fantasy, medieval, fighter, warrior, knight, fps, rpg, rts, survival, action, adventure, strategy, battle, shooter, moba, horror, epic, quest, realistic, sandbox, man, paladin, voice over, voice asset, dialogue, sfx, phrases, words and phrases, game sound, audio, sound, human, game, gameplay, war, battlefield, expressions, efforts,


Website for more voices or phrases: https://www.christopherromance.com/
